CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1957, pg. A8, reads: "Charming and Intelligent Too! - Left to right: Judith Loftin, Delores Jackson, Lenora Ivey, Patricia Morant, and Dorothy Gaddie were guest of the Gay Debs Club at a scholarship tea, held recently. The tea was the kick-off for the club's scholarship contest, and these young ladies are contestants. Other contestants are Thomas Pitts, Barbara Brookins and Carrie Rosenson. Marian Brown is chairman of the contest. Gladys Brown is the club president, and Mary Busch, the sponsor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Contestants for scholarship from Gay Debs Club, from left: Judith Loftin, Delores Jackson, Lenora Ivey, Patricia Morant, and Dorothy Gaddie posed in front of concrete steps of home, street no. 5711
